bower-ui-grid

This repo is for distribution on bower. The source for this module is in the main UI Grid repo. Please file issues and pull requests against that repo.

Install

Install with bower:

bower install angular-ui-grid

Add <script> and <link> tags to your index.html:

<link rel="stylesheet" href="/bower_components/ui-grid/ui-grid.css" />
<script src="/bower_components/ui-grid/ui-grid.js"></script>

Documentation

Documentation is available on the UI Grid site.
